name: arlo-meeting-assistant
description: Arlo - Open-source Zoom Apps meeting assistant with RTMS and AI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:rtms"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:rtms
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset

author: Zoom Developer Relations
